item.title: Doom Scrolling
item.description: For better or for worse, it’s hard to refute technology’s influence on our culture. Technical innovations in medicine, communication systems, energy, engineering, and AI are just a few fields impacted by tech’s development. In fact, this innovation has been observed to be exponential1. Therefore, significant innovation will occur with higher frequency as current technologies are further developed. However, I believe most innovation seeks to benefit corporations, CEOs, and shareholders at the expense of the people.
